name: Pitchbrite
tag_list: professional-networking, entrepreneurship, venture-capital, private-equity, acquisitions, relationship-management
overview: Pitchbrite connects entrepreneurs with investors. Building a business is hard enough. We believe the fundraising process should be easier, and less clouded with mystery. We’ve started at the top of the funnel, and set out to answer the question: “Which investors are right for you?” Having sat on the investor side of the table for many years, we heard a variant of that question over and over from entrepreneurs: “Who else should we talk with?” or “Ok, if you’re not a fit, what VC firms might be?” Pitchbrite uses a proprietary recommendation engine to provide you with VC matches, and uncovers social connections to provide you with intros.
